Package br.com.concepting.framework.persistence

Class BasePersistence<CN,​T,​M extends BaseModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.BasePersistence<CN,​T,​M>
  • Type Parameters:
    CN - Class that defines the connection implementation.
    T - Class that defines the transaction implementation.
    M - Class that defines the data model of the persistence.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICrud<M>, IPersistence<M>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HibernatePersistence
    public abstract class BasePersistence<CN,​T,​M extends BaseModel>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPersistence<M>
    Class that defines the basic implementation of the persistence of data models.
    Since:
    1.0.0
